function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Theoretical model of how 5G enables COVID-19 prevention and control","Impact":"Misunderstanding of 5G's actual capabilities for pandemic control","Mitigation":"Provide clear explanations and evidence of 5G's applications in pandemic control","Technologies":"5G technology","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and general public","Owner":"Researchers, technology experts"},{"Description":"Use of novel and creative applications of digital technologies in pandemic control","Impact":"Unforeseen consequences or unintended negative impacts of new applications","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and risk assessment of new applications before widespread implementation","Technologies":"5G technology, novel digital applications","People":"Users of digital applications, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Technology experts, healthcare professionals, researchers"},{"Description":"Grounded from 212 cases which applied 5G to combat against the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Incomplete or biased data leading to incorrect conclusions about 5G's effectiveness in pandemic control","Mitigation":"Ensure data collection is representative and comprehensive, and consider the limitations of the data","Technologies":"Data collection methods, 5G technology","People":"Researchers, policymakers, technology experts","Owner":"Researchers, data analysts"}]}
